content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore
- Transport Belt network connecting to a Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing iron ore and copper ore

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20.0, -70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (-21.0, -62.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) waiting for source items
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) waiting for source items
- Transport Belt network connecting furnaces and inserters

### Coal Mining Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) out of fuel
- Transport Belt network connecting to a Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) waiting for source items

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal, iron ore, and iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) waiting for source items
- Wooden Chest at position (3.5, 0.5) empty

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Lack of Ingredients in Furnaces
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. Check the input supply and ensure it is connected and operational.

### Errors Due to Out of Fuel in Mining Drills
- Regularly check the fuel levels of mining drills and refuel them as needed to avoid interruptions in resource extraction.

### Errors When Inserters are Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that the source items are available and that the inserters are correctly positioned to pick up items from the source. Ensure the transport belts are functioning and delivering items to the inserters.
